title: *Pet Friendly*Sunny 1 bed*Comm Ave B line*HEAT & HW Inc*Dog/Cat OK*
posting_body: ['This 1 bedroom apartment can also be used as a 2 bed with no living room.', 'Hardwood floors throughout.', 'Great location directly on the Green B line perfect for transporting to Boston College or Boston University.', 'Heat & hot water included.', 'Laundry in building- Elevator in building makes for easy move-in, & laundry.', 'Dogs & Cats ok (breed restrictions).', 'Starry internet offered for $50.', '$50 extra for each pet.', 'Contact me today for a showing.', 'Listing: <URL> tour: <URL>', 'PROPERTY INFO', 'ID: 41323351', 'Rent: $2,200 / Month', 'Beds: 1', 'Bath: 1', 'Available Date: 09/01/2022', 'Pet: Pet Friendly', 'Rent Includes:: Heat, Hot Water', 'Parking:: street parking', 'FEATURES', 'Elevator', 'Tammie Lynn PROPERTY INFOID: 41323351Rent: $2,200 / MonthBeds: 1Bath: 1Available Date: 09/01/2022Pet: Pet FriendlyRent Includes:: Heat, Hot WaterParking:: street parkingFEATURESElevator in buildingManagement office in building']
